attributes.action: Provide for the contingency of a NO DEAL and revert to WTO arrangements.
attributes.additional_details:
Provide for the contingency of a NO DEAL and revert to WTO arrangements by March 2019 or within a Transition of 21 months. 

The referendum was to LEAVE the EU, single market and customs union. I and the people who sign this petition, wish to convey that we understand the difficult with a NO DEAL and wish our government to move forward with hast the preparations to execute WTO tariffs.

Planning, resources and budget to be provided to support this direction.
attributes.background: The referendum was to LEAVE the EU, single market and customs union. I and the people who sign this petition, wish to convey that we understand the difficult with a NO DEAL and wish our government to move forward with hast the preparations.
